Store.name: M16
Store.desc: The M16 rifle is a gas operated standard infantry assault rifle, chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO round.

Store.name: FN FiveSeven
Store.desc: The FN Five Seven is a standard issue handgun that was designed to fire a 5.7 mm round. It is an effective weapon against close range targets.

Store.name: G36
Store.desc: The MTAC X36 assault rifle fires a 5.56 mm round. Its high rate of fire and medium recoil deliver a reasonably tight spread on impact of targets up to medium ranges.

Store.name: AK-74M
Store.desc: The AK-74M assault rifle is an upgrade of the AK 74 design with a slightly increased rate of fire. It fires a 5.45 x 39 mm round accurately at medium ranges.

Store.name: AKM
Store.desc: The AKM is an assault rifle that was designed as a simplified version of the AK-47 rifle. It fires a 7.62 x 39 mm round and is relatively effective at medium ranges.

Store.name: AKS-74U
Store.desc: The AKS-74U is a shortened gas operated carbine version of the AKS-74 assault rifle. It fires a 5.45 x 39 mm round and is very effective at medium ranges.

Store.name: M4 Semi
Store.desc: The civilian M4 semi auto rifle, chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO round.

Store.name: M4
Store.desc: The M4 is a versitile, light weight, commando style assault rifle that is gas operated and fires a 5.56 x 45 mm round effectively in both close and medium ranges.

Store.name: PKM
Store.desc: The PKM machine gun was designed to fire a 7.62 mm rounds from a linked system and is reasonably accurate out to medium ranged targets.

Store.name: MP7
Store.desc: The RA TR7 submachine gun is a special issue weapon that fires a 4.6 mm standard cartridge from a 30 round magazine. It is effective at close range targets.

Store.name: UZI
Store.desc: The special issue UZI submachine gun is a open bolt, blow back design that fires 9 mm rounds from its magazine housed in the weapons pistol grip.

Store.name: SVD
Store.desc: The SVD sniper rifle was designed to fire a 7.62 mm round from a 10 round clip. Combined with an Optical Sniper Scope it is extremely accurate.

Store.name: VSS VINTOREZ
Store.desc: The VSS Vintorez sniper rifle was designed to fire a 9 x 39 mm round using a gas operated, rotating bolt firing system. It is designed to be effective at medium distances.

Store.name: MAUSER SP66
Store.desc: The Mauser SP66 sniper rifle was designed to fire a .308W round from a 5 round clip. It is highly accurate at long ranges when combined with a good scope.

Store.name: AW Magnum
Store.desc: The AWM sniper rifle fires a custom .338W magnum round with devastating accuracy and effect. Each of its rounds deal a very high amount of damage.

Store.name: M107
Store.desc: The M107 sniper rifle fires a .50 caliber round that strikes with deadly effect at extreme ranges. It has a 10 round clip that allows for a high rate of fire.

Store.name: RPK-74
Store.desc: The RPK-74 machine gun fires a 5.45 mm high velocity round that delivers a reasonably accurate rate of fire onto targets out to medium ranges.

Store.name: FN M249
Store.desc: The FN M249 machine gun fires a 5.56 mm round from a belt fed system. It is highly effective against targets at close and medium ranges.

Store.name: SAIGA
Store.desc: The Saiga was developed as a 12 gauge shotgun with a 8 round storage tube. It inflicts a substancial amount of damage on targets at a close range.

Store.name: MP5/10
Store.desc: The MP5/10 submachine gun was designed to fire a 10 mm Auto rounds from a 30 round clip effectively against close ranged targets.

Store.name: Honey Badger
Store.desc: The Honey Badger submachine gun fires a .300 round at a medium rate of fire causing a good amount of damage on close range targets.

Store.name: FN P90
Store.desc: The FN P90 submachine gun was designed to fire 9 mm rounds from a large 50 round magazine. It is very effective on close range targets.

Store.name: EVO-3
Store.desc: The EVO-3 submachine gun was designed to effectively fire 9 mm rounds from a 25 round magazine at close ranged targets at a very high rate of fire..

Store.name: BIZON
Store.desc: The Bizon submachine gun was designed to fire a 9 mm round from a 64 round magazine delivering accurate fire on close range targets.

Store.name: B92
Store.desc: The B92 handgun was specially designed to fire a 9mm round and is reasonably effective agains close range targets.

Store.name: B93R
Store.desc: The B93R handgun was designed to fire a 9mm parabellum round from a 20 round clip. It is a relatively effective weapon against close ranged targets.

Store.name: Jericho 9mm
Store.desc: The Jericho was designed as a universal self-loading pistol which fires a 9mm Parabellum round and is highly effective at close range.

Store.name: Sig Sauer P226
Store.desc: The SIG P226 is a full-sized, service-type pistol made by SIG Sauer. It been designed to fire a 9 x 19 mm round that makes it an effective weapon against close ranged targets.

Store.name: MOSSBERG 590
Store.desc: The Mossberg 590 is a 12 gauge shotgun which has a 8 round storage tube. It is known to do an extremely high amount of damage at close range.

Store.name: MASADA
Store.desc: The Masada was designed for close combat operations and is a gas operated assault rifle that fires a chambered for 5.56x45mm NATO round. It is highly effective at close ranges.

Store.name: SIG SAUER 556
Store.desc: The 556 is a gas operated, rotating bolt assault rifle that fires a 5.56 x 45 mm round and was designed for special operations. It is very effective out to medium ranges.

Store.name: IMI TAR-21
Store.desc: The TAR-21 is an unique gas operated, rotating bolt, bullpup design assault rifle that fires a 5.56 x 45 mm round. It is extremely effective at close and medium range.

Store.name: Desert Eagle
Store.desc: The Desert Eagle handgun was designed to fire a .50 caliber round and deals a substancial amount of damage to targets at close ranges.

Store.name: KT DECIDER
Store.desc: The KT Decider is a bull-pup shotgun design that has two magazine feed tubes, each side capable of holding 7 shells, for a total capacity of 14+1.

Store.name: FN SCAR CQC
Store.desc: The SCAR 16 CQC is an advanced assault rifle that fires standard 5.56 x 45 mm rounds effectively out to medium ranges.

Store.name: RA H23
Store.desc: The RA LMG36 was designed to fire a 7.62 mm standard round. This machine gun delivers a reasonable amount of accurate fire onto targets at medium ranges.

Store.name: AA-12
Store.desc: The AA-12 gauge automatic shotgun was designed to fire 12 gauge rounds from a 20 round storage system. It causes a reasonable amount of damage per round.

Store.name: VERESK SR-2
Store.desc: The MTAC Flasher submachine gun was designed to fire a standard 9 mm round at a high rate of fire with reasonable accuracy at close range targets.

Store.name: FN SCAR NIGHT STALKER
Store.desc: The Scar 17 CQC Nightstalker is a assault rifle that fires standard 5.56 x 45 mm rounds effectively out to medium ranges.

Store.name: MAUSER SRG DESERT
Store.desc: The Mauser SP66 Desert sniper rifle fires a .308W round.

Store.name: STI Eagle Elite .45 ACP
Store.desc: The STI Eagle Elite handgun is an upgraded version of the STI Eagle and is designed to fire a .45 ACP round effectively at close ranges.

Store.name: FN P90 S
Store.desc: The FN P90S submachine gun is a highly effective weapon that carries a unique 50 round magazine. It fires a standard 5.56 mm round.

Store.name: BLASER R93
Store.desc: The Blaser is a bolt action sniper rifle, designed to fire a .308W round from a 5 round clip. It is a highly accurate weapon at longer ranges.

Store.name: Antibiotics
Store.desc: Over the counter antibiotics that aid in curing colds and other minor ailments.

Store.name: Bandages
Store.desc: Common bandages which heal minor wounds and stops excessive bleeding.

Store.name: Bandages DX
Store.desc: Medical bandages which heal moderate wounds and stops excessive bleeding.

Store.name: Tactical Knife
Store.desc: A standard issue knife with an 8" fixed blade, this knife was first designed in 1985 for the United States Army and was later adapted by several other countries as well as mercenary groups throughout the world due to its sturdy design and stopping power.

Store.name: Bat
Store.desc: Handy for those times when you need to beat the crap outta something or somebody.

Store.name: Pain killers
Store.desc: Over the counter pain killers that counter-act the effects of pain on the body.

Store.name: Zombie Repellent
Store.desc: A spray on solution that when applied to the skin, it enters the blood stream and masks the smell of fresh blood.

Store.name: C01-Vaccine
Store.desc: An early prototype vaccine that when injected into your bloodstream fights off the infection and lowers blood toxicity levels. Its effectiveness is low however in comparison to later developed vaccines.

Store.name: C04-Vaccine
Store.desc: A cure to the infection that was developed only weeks after the initial signs of the infection. Having had only a few weeks of production before the infected had taken over, supply is very low and demand is extremely high for these valuable vaccines.

Store.name: Medkit
Store.desc: A standard field medical kit commonly used by Medics to heal wounded soldiers on the battlefield. Very effective

Store.name: Time Capsule
Store.desc: Write a message and leave it anywhere in the world for others to find

Store.name: Flashlight
Store.desc: Flashlight for night time, also blinds other players and doubles as a last resort blunt object to bash in the heads of the infected

Store.name: Hammer
Store.desc: Go with the funk, it is said. If you cant groove to this then you probably are dead. Stop, Hammer time.

Store.name: Hatchet
Store.desc: Cold-Steel, drop forged head with differential heat treatment. American Hickory Handle. Sharp corners will easily pierce the thickest skull and the razor sharp edge will shear through flesh and bone like it was white bread.

Store.name: Pickaxe
Store.desc: Spiked head, flat chisel. Has a good chance of getting stuck in the skull. Awkward to use in tight quarters.

Store.name: Frag Grenade
Store.desc: The fragmentation grenade is used to spray shrapnel upon exploding. Pull the pin and dont forget to throw it far.. Fire in the hole!

Store.name: Chemlight White
Store.desc: A white glow stick

Store.name: Flare
Store.desc: Throw these to light up an area for a few minutes, also handy as a way to occupy the infected

Store.name: Spiked Bat
Store.desc: Just your traditional baseball bat. With spikes. Razor sharp, sure to leave a mark.

Store.name: Metal Bat
Store.desc: Aluminum, will never rust. Heads bounce off faster. Not suitable for major league destruction.

Store.name: Binoculars
Store.desc: A great way to checkout if an area is safe before entering, keep an eye out for infected and bandits

Store.name: Barb wire barricade
Store.desc: Drag this across a doorway to barricade the entrance leaving you safe inside, unless something is already inside with you!

Store.name: Wood shield barricade
Store.desc: Great for blocking doorways to keep out those pesky infected

Store.name: Riot Shield
Store.desc: Its a riot shield! Hide behind it for safety

Store.name: Range Finder
Store.desc: Need to know how far away something is? The range finder can be your best friend when sneaking around searching for survival items

Store.name: Double Barrel
Store.desc: Also known as Doubles or Broomsticks, this powerful shotgun allows two shots to be fired in quick succession before reloading

Store.name: Compound Crossbow
Store.desc: String drawn compound hunting crossbow for silent kills. Uses bow arrows for ammo

Store.name: Air horn
Store.desc: Do your friends keep getting attacked? Be the hero and blow your air horn to make the infected come after you instead.

Store.name: Sandbag barricade
Store.desc: These should keep out the undead.. until they learn to climb that is

Store.name: Chemlight blue
Store.desc: A blue glowstick

Store.name: Chemlight green
Store.desc: A green glowstick. Ravers favorite color

Store.name: Chemlight orange
Store.desc: An orange glowstick

Store.name: Chemlight red
Store.desc: A red glowstick

Store.name: Chemlight yellow
Store.desc: A yellow glowstick

Store.name: Ruger
Store.desc: Reliable and relatively common, the lower powered Kruger .22 is a household staple, allowing for low cost practice with firm control

Store.name: Colt Anaconda
Store.desc: Introduced in 1990, the Colt Anaconda is a large double action .44 caliber revolver featuring a six round cylinder, designed and produced by the Colt's Manufacturing Company

Store.name: Kruger .22 Rifle
Store.desc: Semi-automatic .22 Long Rifle with removable rotary magazine

Store.name: Kruger Mini-14
Store.desc: The Kruger's short size makes it ideal for all situations where ease of maneuverability is a priority, whether it be on the ranch or the deep woods.

Store.name: Kandy Kane
Store.desc: For yuletide slaughtering in style!

Store.name: Katana
Store.desc: Ancient deadly sharp Samurai weapon, hand made to cleave your foe cleanly in two. Or three...or four....

Store.name: Jokoto Katana
Store.desc: Among the most ancient blades, the Jokoto Katana's were manufactured for only the most elite and honorable of warriors. Carrying such a blade imparts great responsibility.

Store.name: Wakizashi
Store.desc: Shorter than its counterpart, the wakizashi is designed for closer combat and even ritual suicide.

Store.name: Machete
Store.desc: A rough but sharp blade used for clearing brush

Store.name: Mosin
Store.desc: A Russian bolt action rifle with an internally fed magazine, this reliable rifle has been in popular use through countless wars since 1891
Standard US service pistol known for its minimal recoil and light weight

Store.name: Brass Knuckles
Store.desc: A tried and true classic. Pummel your enemies into submission!

Store.name: Canoe Paddle
Store.desc: Wooden canoe paddle

Store.name: Cricket bat
Store.desc: Score some runs and crush some skulls!

Store.name: Shovel
Store.desc: Practical AND deadly

Store.name: Chainsaw
Store.desc: Tear through undead and living alike with this fearsome household tool

Store.name: Personal locker
Store.desc: Placeable personal storage unit

Store.name: Wooden door block
Store.desc: 2 meters high

Store.name: Metal wall block
Store.desc: 2 meters high

Store.name: Tall brick wall block
Store.desc: Large brick wall piece

Store.name: Wooden wall piece, 2M
Store.desc: 2 meter tall wooden wall piece

Store.name: Short brick wall piece
Store.desc: Short brick wall block

Store.name: Industrial power generator
Store.desc: Industrial strength power generator

Store.name: Small Power Generator
Store.desc: Small Power Generator

Store.name: Solar Water Purifier
Store.desc: Small solar powered water purifier

Store.name: Placeable light
Store.desc: Moveable, placeable light source

Store.name: Butterfly Knife
Store.desc: A folding knife with two handles counter rotating around the blade so that when its closed the blade concealed

Store.name: Crowbar
Store.desc: A multi use household tool, useful for construction or surviving an apocalyptic event

Store.name: Fire Axe
Store.desc: Standard issue axe used by firefighters to enter buildings and remove dangerous debris

Store.name: Frying Pan
Store.desc: Whether frying an egg or flattening a face, the common household frying pan has many uses

Store.name: Garden Shears
Store.desc: Whether shortening hedges or heads these shears are sure to come in handy

Store.name: Golf Club
Store.desc: Best used for long drives. FORE!

Store.name: Pitchfork
Store.desc: Designed to move hay economically, its intimidating design suits it well to sticking some undead

Store.name: Police Baton
Store.desc: Used by law enforcement as an aid in hand to hand combat, often to subdue unruly or resistant suspects

Store.name: Power Drill
Store.desc: Battery powered and unconventional, the drill is quite effective at dispatching enemies in the grisliest way

Store.name: Wrench
Store.desc: Loved by plumbers around the world, this hefty tool can easily collapse the skulls of your foes

Store.name: Nail Gun
Store.desc: Commonly used in construction

Store.name: Bag of Chips
Store.desc: A bag of potato chips. Relieves minor hunger. BBQ Flavor!

Store.name: Bag MRE
Store.desc: Meals Ready-to-Eat. Extremely convenient! An MRE can be eaten cold, right out of the pouch but they always taste better hot. Each serving size substantially relieves hunger and thirst

Store.name: Instant Oatmeal
Store.desc: A heart warming way to start your day. Classic Maple and Brown Sugar. Relieves a moderate amount of hunger.

Store.name: Coconut Water
Store.desc: A bottle of delicious coconut water that when consumed quenches moderate thirst.

Store.name: Chocolate Bar
Store.desc: A milk chocolate candy bar. The finest in gourmet chocolate. Each serving size provides minor sustenance.

Store.name: Granola Bar
Store.desc: An organic granola bar. Each serving size helps relieve moderate hunger.

Store.name: Can of Pasta
Store.desc: A can of delicious Pasta-O's. Fortified with iron and vitamins. Low sugar and low fat. Suitable for Vegetarians. Gluten Free

Store.name: Can of Soup
Store.desc: A can of creamy tomato soup. No need to add water. Relieves moderate hunger.

Store.name: Can of Ham
Store.desc: Mechanically separated Spiced Ham in a 5-ounce cans. May contain pig parts. Relieves moderate hunger.

Store.name: Can of Tuna
Store.desc: Chunk lite savory tuna in water. Firm, flaky, fresh tasting that you can really tear into. Each serving relieves moderate hunger.

Store.name: Energy drink
Store.desc: A caffeine jump-start that when consumed quenches moderate thirst.

Store.name: Electro-AID
Store.desc: A flavored drink with electrolytes that when consumed quenches moderate thirst.

Store.name: Can of soda
Store.desc: A carbonated beverage that when consumed quenches moderate thirst.

Store.name: Juice
Store.desc: A healthy drink that when consumed quenches moderate thirst.

Store.name: Water 1L
Store.desc: A large bottle of water that when consumed quenches moderate thirst.

Store.name: Water 375ml
Store.desc: A small bottle of water that when consumed quenches moderate thirst.

Store.name: MiniSaints
Store.desc: Creamy, moist and delectable, MiniSaints are a delicious treat the whole family can enjoy! Best consumed while watching family movies, possibly involving snow and dogs.

Store.name: K. Style Helmet
Store.desc: The good ol' Turtle Head is guaranteed to protect your brain. (Well, at least a little bit) Level 2 Protection

Store.name: Custom Guerilla
Store.desc: Custom designed guerilla field gear and body armor that allows for decent protection under fast moving conditions. Level 2 Protection

Store.name: Beret Cover
Store.desc: This cover is a stylish military fashion statement which stands out smashingly in a combat zone!

Store.name: Boonie Cover
Store.desc: This Jungle Boonie cover is high speed, great for blending in and blocking out the sun and bugs but it won't stop bullets.

Store.name: Shadow
Store.desc: This head gear was designed to not only make you look scary but also to protect your pretty face.

Store.name: Black Mask
Store.desc: The frightening Black Mask of Death, sure to give your enemies the chills.

Store.name: Clown Mask
Store.desc: For all of you Jokers out there, we bring you the Clown Mask.

Store.name: Jason Mask
Store.desc: Hiding a monster, this mask strikes real horror in those who face it.

Store.name: Skull Mask
Store.desc: The Skull Mask shows you know how to Grin and Bear it!

Store.name: Slash Mask
Store.desc: While not just another pretty face, the Slash Mask is a cut above the rest! Get it and look the part of a killer.

Store.name: Boonie Desert
Store.desc: This boonie hat is great for desert ops, keeping you out of the sun and foiling those pesky bugs.

Store.name: Boonie Green
Store.desc: While not a bullet stopper this boonie hat will keep you cool and in camo in the wild places.

Store.name: M9 helmet black
Store.desc: The M9 helmet gives a good standard of head protection. This one in black.

Store.name: M9 Helmet with Goggles
Store.desc: The M9 helmet gives a good standard of head protection. This one with goggles.

Store.name: M9 Helmet Green
Store.desc: The M9 helmet gives a good standard of head protection. This one in green.

Store.name: M9 Helmet Urban
Store.desc: The M9 helmet gives a good standard of head protection. This one in Urban camo.

Store.name: M9 Helmet Forest 1
Store.desc: The M9 helmet gives a good standard of head protection. This one in a special forest pattern.

Store.name: M9 Helmet Goggles 1
Store.desc: The M9 helmet gives a good standard of head protection. This one with goggles.

Store.name: IBA Sand
Store.desc: Special IBA release gear in Sand toned pattern with Level 2 protection.

Store.name: MTV Forest
Store.desc: Limited edition MTV release Forest patterned gear with Level 2 protection.

Store.name: Light Gear Forest
Store.desc: Light weight Level 1 protection in a Green Forest pattern.

Store.name: NVG Goggles
Store.desc: Standard K style helmet rigged with NVG set up for night ops.

Store.name: Boonie Hat Leather
Store.desc: This is the boonie hat that comes with a bit of sophistication. It is all leather, which is bound to be a hit, but it will not stop one!

Store.name: Fireman Helmet
Store.desc: The traditional Firefighters helmet has been saving men for years. Give it a try if you want to be different in the battlezone.

Store.name: Hard Hat
Store.desc: The traditional construction hard hat is just the ticket for knocking around old buildings and showing your enemies that you are tough!

Store.name: Gas Mask
Store.desc: A mask put over your face to protect from inhaling airborn pollutants and toxic gasses

Store.name: Gas Mask 2
Store.desc: A mask put over your face to protect from inhaling airborn pollutants and toxic gasses

Store.name: Night vision military
Store.desc: Otherwise known as NVD's. These enhance light allowing the user to see in almost total darkness

Store.name: Night vision civilian
Store.desc: Night vision for everyone, these affordable goggles allow you to see at night while remaining hidden in the darkness

Store.name: Halloween Special!
Store.desc: A unique mask to celebrate the eve of the hallows. Eat, Drink and be Scary! Wuhahahahaaa!

Store.name: Christmas Special
Store.desc: A yule tide treat

Store.name: Santa's Lil Helper
Store.desc: Makin presents for all the good girls and boys!

Store.name: Captain Jack Frost
Store.desc: With a corncob pipe and a button nose...

Store.name: Medium Backpack
Store.desc: A medium sized backpack with plenty of space and durability.

Store.name: Small Backpack
Store.desc: A small backpack allowing some storage for essential items and equipment.

Store.name: Large Backpack
Store.desc: 24 item backpack. Big enough for a few weeks of adventuring

Store.name: Military Ruck
Store.desc: The mother of all backpacks. Carry 32 items at once!

Store.name: Teddy Bear backpack
Store.desc: Roman's favorite accessory

Store.name: ALICE Rucksack
Store.desc: Large backpack that fits everything you will need. The All-purpose Lightweight Individual Carrying Equipment. Dont forget the poo tickets!

Store.name: Santa's Sack
Store.desc: With presents for everyone! Well, mostly zombies. And bandits.

Store.name: Forward Grip
Store.desc: The bottom rail grip will allow the shooter more control of the weapon by use of the attached grip.

Store.name: 5.45 AK 30
Store.desc: This is a standard 5.45x39mm 30 rounds clip for the russian AK 74M family of rifles

Store.name: ACOG
Store.desc: The Acog is a rail mounted telescopic sight used to extend a shooters accuracy on medium to long range shots.

Store.name: Rifle Laser
Store.desc: The Laser attachment mounts onto the side of a weapon and allows the shooter to mark the target with the laser.

Store.name: Holographic
Store.desc: The Holosight is a rail mounted holographic sight used to extend a shooters accuracy at close and medium ranges.

Store.name: SCAR IS
Store.desc: This is the improved flip up iron sight system for the Scar assault rifle. It attachess onto the upper rail.

Store.name: Kobra
Store.desc: The Kobra is a rail mounted red dot sight used to extend a shooters accuracy at close and medium range targets.

Store.name: Tactical Sniper Scope
Store.desc: 8x rail mounted scope designed to be used used atmedium ranges.

Store.name: SMG Grip
Store.desc: The M 7 grip provides a shooter with more control and accuracy when firing a weapon at a high rate of fire.

Store.name: STANAG 60
Store.desc: Large 60 round clip of 5.45x45mm NATO rounds for use with the M4 and M16

Store.name: Flash Hider
Store.desc: The Muzzle FlashHider will lower the visual flash of a weapon when fired at normal or rapid speeds.

Store.name: Silencer
Store.desc: The Silencer will lower the sound of a weapons discharge when fired at normal or rapid speeds.

Store.name: STANAG 45
Store.desc: Medium 45 round clip of 5.45x45mm NATO rounds for use with the M4 and M16 Assault Rifles

Store.name: STANAG 30
Store.desc: Standard 30 round clip of 5.45x45mm NATO rounds for use with the M4 and M16 Assault Rifles

Store.name: STANAG C-Mag
Store.desc: Maximum size100 round drum of 5.45x45mm NATO rounds for use with the M4 and M16 Assault Rifles

Store.name: Rifle Flashlight
Store.desc: The Flashlight can be used to light dark areas and temporarily blind a shooters opponent.

Store.name: Compact Scope
Store.desc: The Swiss Compact Sight is a rail mounted scope used to extend a shooters accuracy at close and medium ranges.

Store.name: Red Dot SP
Store.desc: The Swiss Red Dot Sight is a rail mounted sight used to extend a shooters accuracy at close and medium range targets

Store.name: Pistol laser
Store.desc: The Pistol Laser is mounted on the left side of a handgun and used to target the enemy with a laser light.

Store.name: Pistol Flashlight
Store.desc: The Pistol Flashlight can be used to light dark areas and temporarily blind a shooters opponent.

Store.name: Reflex Sight
Store.desc: The Reflex Sight is a rail mounted scope used to extend a shooters accuracy at medium and long ranges.

Store.name: M4 IS
Store.desc: This is the improved flip up iron sight system for the M4 Blackwater. It attachess onto the upper rail.

Store.name: PSO-1

Store.name: G36 ammo
Store.desc: This is a 30 round magazine of 5.56x45mm specially designed for the G36 Assault Rifle

Store.name: VSS-20
Store.desc: Specially designed high power 9x39mm low velocity, high penetration subsonic round for VSS Vintorez sniper rifle. Extended 20 rounds magazine.

Store.name: VSS-10
Store.desc: Specially designed high power 9x39mm low velocity, high penetration subsonic round for VSS Vintorez sniper rifle. Standard 10 rounds magazine.

Store.name: MP7 40
Store.desc: HK 4.6×30mm 40 rounds extended magazine for MP7 submachine gun.

Store.name: MP7 30
Store.desc: HK 4.6×30mm 30 rounds magazine for MP7 submachine gun.

Store.name: 9x19 Para Mag
Store.desc: 18 rounds 9x19mm Parabellum magazine specially designed for Sig Sauer P226 handgun

Store.name: M249 IS
Store.desc: This is the improved flip up iron sight system for the M249 machine gun. It attachess onto the upper rail.

Store.name: KT IS
Store.desc: This is the improved flip up iron sight system for the Keltech shotgun that attaches on it's upper rail.

Store.name: Blackwater Long Range
Store.desc: The Blackwater Long Range scope is a 10x rail mounted scope designed to be used used at long ranges.

Store.name: Swiss Arms Scope 8x
Store.desc: The Swiss Arms multirail scope is a rail mounted scope used to extend a shooters accuracy at medium and long ranges.

Store.name: Iron AK74M
Store.desc: This is the improved flip up iron sight system for the AK-74M n that attaches on it's upper rail.

Store.name: AWM .338 Magnum ammo

Store.name: P90 50 rounds
Store.desc: P90 Compact Assault rifle rounds. 50 round clip

Store.name: Bizon 64 ammo
